div.p: Fabiana Barcelos Furtado, Ary Fernandes Junior: idea and concept of the paper; Fabiana Barcelos Furtado, Bruna Cristina Borges, Hans Garcia Garces, Luiz Domingues de Almeida Junior, Thaise Lara Teixeira: performed the experiments; Fabiana Barcelos Furtado, Fernanda Cristina BÃ©rgamo Alves, Ary Fernandes Junior: analyzed the data; Claudio Vieira da Silva, Ary Fernandes Junior: contributed reagents/materials/analysis tools; all authors: article preparation.
